      • getShowColumnLabel

        boolean getShowColumnLabel(int columnIndex)
        If true the elements in the correspondent column (zero-based) has at least one element with label.
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - Column to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if at least one column has a displayable label, false otherwise.

      • getPosition

        int getPosition()
        Gets the frame relative position.
        Returns:
        Gets the position of the frame. Value is greater equal to 0 and less than container maximum frame count.

        Sets the relative position of the frame.

        framePosition - New position to set.
